segments.text: My eyes drift to the other side of the kitchen, near the open cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy, precariously balanced on a two-step stool, reaching into a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined to get those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is clearly labeled 'COOKIE JAR,' and it's full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is already deep inside, grabbing a handful, I presume.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl stands nearby, her hand outstretched, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's looking up at him with such anticipation; it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how sneaky these kids are being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so wobbly; it could tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a bit disgusting how easily they’re getting away with this right under the adult’s nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware of their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I guess they'll enjoy those stolen cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
